In England, in the seven days to 22 July, there were 98,199 new confirmed cases (173.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 July, there were 151,229 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 35% (53,030 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 July is 19,642,180 (34,734.1 cases per 100,000 population).
